SEEK: DES.con CS2013: SE/Software Design/Overview of Design Paradigms
This module introduces the innovation process and transition to concrete notions of design in engineering as a whole and software engineering in particular.

Preparation: 1 hour reading
Preparation Quiz: 30 minutes
Discussion: 50 minutes
Practice: 2 hours 30 minutes

subheading.title: Learning Objectives
subheading.row: Understand how to estimate the total number of defects for a project using the Capture-Recapture method.
Know the importance of defect containment by understanding the play between defect injection and removal rates.
